subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|historical}} to [[visit]] a [[state]] as an [[envoy]]
# to [[engage]]; to [[employ]]
# to [[betroth]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[get married]] {{q|as a [[girl]]}}; to [[marry off]] (a daughter)
